text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ha….ha…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Oh, what… I got in the goal before I knew it…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: …Rice Shower-san.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Oh… Bourbon-san…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Defeat, so this is how it feels.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ehh?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
The feeling that I couldn't perform the mission, I am frustrated 
but, I also have a different kind of burning feeling.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Rice Shower-san, you win this race.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Rice won…. Rice won….?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: It was a very good run.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Win over you and become stronger. Please 
run with me again, Rice Shower-san.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: eh…. Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Rice, Really…. Really did win…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Rice did it! McQueen-san, everyone on the team, Trainer-san!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: That's amazing, Rice! you really won!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Yeah! You've met my expectations!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
text_block_list.text:
Rice-san will be back in front of the stand! let's call her 
everyone! one-two-thre…

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: That was, a shame wasn't it.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
text_block_list.text: …eh?

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text:
Oh, I wanted to see the moment of the birth of the Undefeated 
Triple Crown Horse Girl.

I was excited about the victory, and was late to notice the 
situation, There are no 1 or 2 such opinions. it was.
That's what McQueen was going to say before the start.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
What is worrying is that it prevented the birth of the Undefeated 
Triple Crown Horse Girl that many people expected.

In front of the unusual atmosphere that surrounds the race track, 
our voices of joy were too small.

In front of the unusual atmosphere that surrounds the race track, 
our voices of joy were too small.
